name: Shunned Nano
description: It’s inside you. Infesting your brain, warping your flesh. People are afraid of you now. They’re afraid of the power that poisons you. You’re scared too.
special: Start with one randomm Nano power, any starting App or Cybertech is replaced with a random Nano.

values.value: You spent a wild night with a group of neo-pagan cultists, perfomring profane rites to some snake god
A star fell close to you building and you were a curious child
You found drugs. Free drugs. They were neither drugs nor entirely free.
You were kidnapped and subjected to horrible experiments.

bonus.description: You also have one of these

values.details: Deals d4 damage, victims have to test Toughness or bleed 1 HP for d6 rounds.

values.value: Milkwhite eyes that see through lies
values.details: Once per day, when you believe you've been lied to, test Presence DR8. On a success, you can tell whenever the target lies for the rest of the day
-d4 damage taken, not subject to being reduced on a defence fumble. Instead, you take an additional d8 damage, as part of you skin is ripped off

values.value: A second mouth where your navel should be
values.details: Any food or drugs consumed with your navel-mouth are twice as effective

values.value: An elongated, pointed and semi-translucent skull
values.details: Your brain shines underneath, emitting light like that of a candle

values.value: Scales cover most of your body
values.details: any roll to resist cold, heat or radiation is -4DR
